ym:pv:watchID.description: The ID of the watched item.

ym:pv:counterID.description: The ID of the Yandex Metrica counter.

ym:pv:dateTime.description: The date and time of the visit.

ym:pv:title.description: The title of the visited page.

ym:pv:URL.description: The URL of the page visited.

ym:pv:referer.description: The referring page or source of the visit.

ym:pv:UTMCampaign.description: The campaign name specified in the UTM parameters.

ym:pv:UTMContent.description: The content identifier specified in the UTM parameters.

ym:pv:UTMMedium.description: The medium specified in the UTM parameters.

ym:pv:UTMSource.description: The source specified in the UTM parameters.

ym:pv:UTMTerm.description: The term specified in the UTM parameters.

ym:pv:browser.description: The browser used by the visitor.

ym:pv:browserMajorVersion.description: The major version of the visitor's browser.

ym:pv:browserMinorVersion.description: The minor version of the visitor's browser.

ym:pv:browserCountry.description: The country of the visitor's browser.

ym:pv:browserEngine.description: The engine powering the visitor's browser.

ym:pv:browserEngineVersion1.description: The first version component of the browser engine.

ym:pv:browserEngineVersion2.description: The second version component of the browser engine.

ym:pv:browserEngineVersion3.description: The third version component of the browser engine.

ym:pv:browserEngineVersion4.description: The fourth version component of the browser engine.

ym:pv:browserLanguage.description: The language set in the visitor's browser.

ym:pv:clientTimeZone.description: The time zone of the visitor.

ym:pv:cookieEnabled.description: Indicates if cookies are enabled in the visitor's browser.

ym:pv:deviceCategory.description: The category of the visitor's device (desktop, mobile, tablet).

ym:pv:from.description: The URL the visitor came from.

ym:pv:hasGCLID.description: Indicates if the visit has a Google Click Identifier (GCLID).

ym:pv:GCLID.description: The unique identifier used in Google Ads to track ad clicks and conversions.

ym:pv:ipAddress.description: The IP address of the visitor.

ym:pv:javascriptEnabled.description: Indicates if JavaScript is enabled in the visitor's browser.

ym:pv:mobilePhone.description: Indicates if the visitor is using a mobile phone.

ym:pv:mobilePhoneModel.description: The model of the mobile phone if used by the visitor.

ym:pv:openstatAd.description: The advertising campaign identifier from Openstat.

ym:pv:openstatService.description: The advertising service used from Openstat.

ym:pv:operatingSystem.description: The operating system used by the visitor.

ym:pv:operatingSystemRoot.description: The root version of the operating system used by the visitor.

ym:pv:physicalScreenHeight.description: The physical height of the visitor's screen.

ym:pv:physicalScreenWidth.description: The physical width of the visitor's screen.

ym:pv:regionCity.description: The city of the visitor's region.

ym:pv:regionCountry.description: The country of the visitor's region.

ym:pv:regionCityID.description: The city ID of the visitor's region.

ym:pv:regionCountryID.description: The country ID of the visitor's region.

ym:pv:screenColors.description: The color depth of the visitor's screen.

ym:pv:screenFormat.description: The format of the visitor's screen.

ym:pv:screenHeight.description: The height of the visitor's screen.

ym:pv:screenOrientation.description: The orientation of the visitor's screen.

ym:pv:screenWidth.description: The width of the visitor's screen.

ym:pv:windowClientHeight.description: The viewport height of the visitor's window.

ym:pv:windowClientWidth.description: The viewport width of the visitor's window.

ym:pv:lastTrafficSource.description: The last traffic source of the visitor.

ym:pv:lastSearchEngine.description: The last search engine used by the visitor.

ym:pv:lastSearchEngineRoot.description: The root domain of the last search engine used by the visitor.

ym:pv:lastAdvEngine.description: The last advertising engine used by the visitor.

ym:pv:artificial.description: Indicates if the visit is artificial or not.

ym:pv:pageCharset.description: The character encoding of the visited page.

ym:pv:isPageView.description: Indicates if the action is a page view.

ym:pv:link.description: The link clicked during the visit.

ym:pv:download.description: Indicates if a download action occurred during the visit.

ym:pv:notBounce.description: Indicates if the visit is not a bounce.

ym:pv:lastSocialNetwork.description: The last social network accessed by the visitor.

ym:pv:httpError.description: Indicates if an HTTP error occurred during the visit.

ym:pv:clientID.description: The unique ID assigned to the visitor.

ym:pv:networkType.description: The type of network connection used by the visitor.

ym:pv:lastSocialNetworkProfile.description: The profile on the last social network accessed by the visitor.

ym:pv:goalsID.description: The ID of the goal completed during the visit.

ym:pv:shareService.description: The service used for sharing content.

ym:pv:shareURL.description: The URL of the shared content.

ym:pv:shareTitle.description: The title of the shared content.

ym:pv:iFrame.description: Indicates if the content is rendered within an iFrame.

ym:pv:parsedParamsKey1.description: The value of parsed parameter key 1.

ym:pv:parsedParamsKey2.description: The value of parsed parameter key 2.

ym:pv:parsedParamsKey3.description: The value of parsed parameter key 3.

ym:pv:parsedParamsKey4.description: The value of parsed parameter key 4.

ym:pv:parsedParamsKey5.description: The value of parsed parameter key 5.

ym:pv:parsedParamsKey6.description: The value of parsed parameter key 6.

ym:pv:parsedParamsKey7.description: The value of parsed parameter key 7.

ym:pv:parsedParamsKey8.description: The value of parsed parameter key 8.

ym:pv:parsedParamsKey9.description: The value of parsed parameter key 9.

ym:pv:parsedParamsKey10.description: The value of parsed parameter key 10.
